General.Name: Big Pharma Split Corp Class A
General.Description: Big Pharma Split Corp is a closed ended equity mutual fund launched and managed by Harvest Portfolios Group Inc. It invests in the public equity markets across United States. The fund primarily invests in the Pharmaceutical sector. Big Pharma Split Corp was formed on September 15, 2017 and is domiciled in Canada.
General.Address: 610 Chartwell Road, Oakville, ON, Canada, L6j 4A5
